title: Trip Attack

tion

Spend a superiority die to make an attack that deals an additional 1d8 damage and possibly knocks the target Prone. The target must be Large or smaller.

How to unlock Trip Attack

Trip Attack can be acquired by:

Battle Master (Fighter Subclass) Martial Adept (Feat) grants this feature.

Trip Attack Tips & Notes

Difficulty Class of this Attack is 10 + STR or DEX Modifier, whichever is higher.
